name: B. Amr and The Large Array
statement:
Amr has got a large array of size . Amr doesn’t like large arrays so he
intends to make it smaller.Amr doesn’t care about anything in the array
except the beauty of it. The beauty of the array is defined to be the
maximum number of times that some number occurs in this array. He wants
to choose the smallest subsegment of this array such that the beauty of
it will be the same as the original array.Help Amr by choosing the
smallest subsegment possible.
